entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 6 this morning and minus 11 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending late this evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 40%
